data.title: Surface Water Well
data.summary: Provide easy access to clean water for the vilage, supports 200-400 individuals. These wells sustain livelihoods, ensuring a continuous flow of clean water for those in need.

featuredImage.alt: Villagers celebrating the completion of the well, a life-changing moment for the community

content.heading: Each well stands as a paving the way for healthier, thriving livelihoods
content.description: Sub-Saharan Africa grapples with a staggering 40% of its population—approximately 783 million people—deprived of clean drinking water. In this context, each surface well acts as a beacon of hope, serving not only as a source of life but also as a vital lifeline for those lacking access, offering a means to quench the thirst and preserve the lives of many.

content.heading: How is ARCD's Relief responding?
content.description: ARCD’s Relief establishes surface water wells, utilizing natural resources to create accessible water sources for communities in need.

content.heading: A Surface water well can be the community's Lifeline
content.description: A Surface water well can be the community’s Lifeline

featuredImage.alt: Ruins of buildings in Morocco following a devastating earthquake, with rescue workers in action.
